title: Upcoming Listing: BloFin to List YURU for Spot Trading
content: Dear BloFin users, To extend the range of trading options available on BloFin Spot and improve users' spot trading experience, BloFin will soon list $YURU (YURU COIN) on our spot trading markets. Stay tuned! About YURU:YURU COIN is a Solana-based utility meme token launched in February 2025 in Japan. It is derived from the popular national mascot competition, the Yuru-Chara Grand Prix, which has historically attracted millions of participants and votes across Japan. The project aims to revitalize local communities by combining traditional mascot culture with decentralized technology, including NFTs, on-chain voting, and gamified incentives.Designed as the core digital asset for the upcoming “Yuruverse 2025” movement, YURU COIN grants holders various benefits such as exclusive voting rights in character competitions, redemption of mascot-themed merchandise, early access to offline and metaverse events, and airdrop eligibility. These features are intended to create real-world and digital engagement around regional identity and community pride.YURU COIN is currently traded on Jupiter DEX and B2Z Exchange, and is supported by a community of over 2,000 token holders. The project has ongoing initiatives to expand partnerships with municipalities, event organizers, and digital platforms to broaden the impact of Yuru-Chara culture both in Japan and globally. The token also supports burn mechanics and community-driven governance initiatives through DAO mechanisms under development.X LinkOfficial Website Further Reading:BloFin Spot Trading FeeBloFin Spot Trading Guide To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go. Thanks for your support! BloFin TeamAug 28, 2025 Find us onX (Twitter)InstagramTelegramDiscordYoutube BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.
